meanings.definition: Not migrating; staying in one place.
meanings.sent1: The nonmigratory turtle spends its entire life in the same pond.
meanings.sent2: The nonmigratory plants in our garden bloom beautifully every spring.
meanings.sent3: The nonmigratory squirrel decided to set up a permanent home in our backyard.
meanings.sent4: Her nonmigratory nature made her the perfect candidate for the local leadership role.
meanings.sent5: The nonmigratory penguin waddled happily on the icy shore, never leaving its colony.

meanings.definition: A nonmigratory bird that does not travel long distances.
meanings.sent1: The nonmigratory is a type of bird that prefers to stay in the same area all year round.
meanings.sent2: We often see nonmigratory birds like sparrows and pigeons in the city park.
meanings.sent3: The nonmigratory bird had a funny habit of singing loudly every morning at sunrise.
meanings.sent4: The nonmigratory bird stood out among the flock with its vibrant plumage.
meanings.sent5: Children in the neighborhood loved watching the nonmigratory bird build its nest in the old oak tree.
